Self.Wiki: Determines the configuration of the camera when viewing menu elements.

camAtPosX.Wiki: The camera gaze point's position on the x-axis.

camAtPosY.Wiki: The camera gaze point's position on the y-axis.

camAtPosZ.Wiki: The camera gaze point's position on the z-axis.

camDist.Wiki: The distance the camera is from the player entity. In metres.

camRotX.Wiki: The camera's rotation on the x-axis.

camRotY.Wiki: The camera's rotation on the y-axis.

camFov.Wiki: The field of view of the camera.

camDistMin.Wiki: The minimum distance for the camera to be placed at. In metres.

camDistMax.Wiki: The maximum distance for the camera to be placed at. In metres.

camRotXMin.Wiki: The minimum angle for the camera's rotation on the x-axis.

camRotXMax.Wiki: The maximum angle for the camera's rotation on the x-axis.

GparamID.Wiki: The gparam ID to use for this camera.

camOffsetX.Wiki: The offset rate for the camera on the x-axis (0.5 will shift half the screen). In metres.

camOffsetY.Wiki: The offset rate for the camera on the y-axis (0.5 will shift half the screen). In metres.

camOffsetZ.Wiki: The offset rate for the camera on the z-axis. In metres.

camRefDmyPolyId.Wiki: If set to a valid ID, the dummy polygon ID will be used to calculate the gaze point and rotation.

boosterModelLookAt.Wiki: If ON, then the camera's gaze point is fixed to the position of the Booster model.

HandHightRef.AltName: Use Hand Height for Gaze Point
HandHightRef.Wiki: If ON, hand height is used instead of core height for the gaze point.

mapIconRefDmyPolyId.AltName: Mission Location Icon: Dummy Polygon ID
mapIconRefDmyPolyId.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID that is used to place the mission location display icon.

legType4LegRefParamId.Wiki: The MenuOffscrRendParam row to use if the player is using Bipedal legs.

legTypeTankRefParamId.Wiki: The MenuOffscrRendParam row to use if the player is using Treads (tank legs).
